text.div:
SamePersonAs Logical Model

Link to another patient resource that concerns the same actual patient.

name: SamePersonAs
title: obf-SamePersonAs
description: Link to another patient resource that concerns the same actual patient.

element.definition: Link to another patient resource that concerns the same actual patient.

element.short: A person in the role of a patient. Sometimes, the patient is not the subject of information in a clinical statement where the Patient is the SubjectOfRecord.
element.definition:
A person in the role of a patient. Sometimes, the patient is not the subject of information in a clinical statement where the Patient is the SubjectOfRecord.

Compatibility: Lies at the intersection of Argonaut and US Core Patient. MaritalStatus has a required binding in Argonaut, but an extensible binding in US-Core. To be feasible under both DSTU2 Argonaut and STU3 US-Core, the required binding strength is adopted.

element.short: A description of the association between people or items.
element.definition: A description of the association between people or items.
